mapper.sql: id, name, number, shipFromAddressID, labelPrepType,AreCasesRequired, amazongroupid, marketplaceid, warehouseid, shopid, plansubid,auditstatus, remark,createdate, creator, opttime, operator
mapper.select: select sf.id planid,sf.AreCasesRequired,sf.number,g.name,sf.name shipname,sf.creator,sf.createdate,sf.opttime,si.LabelPrepType,sf.warehouseid, wh.name warename ,u.name creatname,sum(si.TotalFee) readyfee, tm.name destination,sf.auditstatus,si.DestinationFulfillmentCenterId centerid, sf.plansubid subid,sf.remark, addre.countryCode,addre.addressLine1, addre.addressLine2,addre.city, addre.name addrname,addre.phone ,addre.stateOrProvinceCode,addre.countryCode, sf.amazongroupid,sf.marketplaceid,sf.AreCasesRequired,sf.shipFromAddressID from t_erp_ship_inboundplan sf left join t_amazon_group g on g.id=sf.amazongroupid left join t_erp_warehouse wh on wh.id=sf.warehouseid left join t_userinfo u on u.id=sf.creator left join t_erp_ship_address addre on addre.id=sf.shipFromAddressID left join t_erp_ship_inboundshipment si on si.inboundplanid=sf.id left join t_marketplace tm on tm.marketplaceId=sf.marketplaceid where sf.id=#{planid,jdbcType=CHAR}

select ifnull(p.location,p2.location) image,m.color skucolor,pro.sku, s.avgsales,pro.name proname,sk.stockingCycle skucycle,m.id materialid, wh.stocking_cycle whcycle,ifnull(iv.quantity,0) fulfillquantity,si.Quantity, ifnull(dim.weight,0) weight, ROUND(ifnull(dim.length,0)*ifnull(dim.width,0)*ifnull(dim.height,0)/5000.0,2) dimweight, m.sku msku from t_erp_ship_inbounditem si left join t_erp_ship_inboundplan sp on sp.id=si.inboundplanid left join t_erp_ship_inboundshipment sm on sm.ShipmentId=si.ShipmentId left join t_marketplace mkt on mkt.marketplaceid=sp.marketplaceid left join t_amazon_auth auth on auth.groupid=sp.amazongroupid and auth.region=case when mkt.region='UK' then 'EU' ELSE mkt.region end left join t_product_info pro on pro.marketplaceid=sp.marketplaceid and pro.sku=si.SellerSKU and pro.amazonAuthId=auth.id left join t_product_in_opt o on o.pid=pro.id left join t_erp_material m on m.sku=ifnull(o.msku,pro.sku) and m.shopid=sp.shopid and m.isDelete = 0 left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image left join t_dimensions dim on dim.id=m.pkgDimensions left join t_picture p2 on p2.id=pro.image left join t_product_in_order s on pro.id=s.pid left join t_erp_stockcycle sk on sk.warehouseid=sp.warehouseid and sk.materialid=m.id left join t_erp_warehouse wh on wh.id=sp.warehouseid left join t_erp_inventory iv on iv.shopid=sp.shopid and iv.warehouseid=sp.warehouseid and iv.materialid=m.id and iv.`status`='fulfillable' where sm.ShipmentId=#{shipmentid,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT b.ShipmentId shipmentid,a.marketplaceid,b.SellerSKU,chan.channame channel,company.simplename company, ifnull(b.QuantityReceived,0) reveiveQuantity, ts.arrivalTime,a.createdate, c.shiped_date ,ifnull(b.QuantityShipped,b.Quantity) Quantity, ts.outarrtime outtime,ts.inarrtime intime, case c.status when 1 then '等待确认' when 2 then '配货' when 0 then '取消货件' when 3 then '装箱' when 4 then '待发货' when 5 then '已发货' when 6 then '已完成' else '--' end status from t_erp_ship_inboundplan a LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inbounditem b on a.id=b.inboundplanid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundshipment c on a.id=c.inboundplanid and c.ShipmentId = b.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundtrans ts on ts.shipmentid=c.shipmentid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transdetail chan on chan.id=ts.channel LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transcompany company on company.id=ts.company LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_status d on c.ShipmentStatus=d.`status` left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid where b.SellerSKU=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and ((a.auditstatus=1 and c.status=1) or (c.status in (2,3,4,5))) and (m.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY a.createdate desc

SELECT b.ShipmentId shipmentid,a.marketplaceid,b.SellerSKU,chan.channame channel,company.simplename company, ifnull(b.QuantityReceived,0) reveiveQuantity, ts.arrivalTime,a.createdate, c.shiped_date ,ifnull(b.QuantityShipped,b.Quantity) Quantity, case when a.auditstatus =3 then case c.status when 1 then '等待确认' when 2 then '配货' when 0 then '取消货件' when 3 then '装箱' when 4 then '待发货' when 5 then '已发货' when 6 then '已完成' else '--' end else a.auditstatus end status, 'isbad' badstatus from t_erp_ship_inboundplan a LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inbounditem b on a.id=b.inboundplanid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundshipment c on a.id=c.inboundplanid and c.ShipmentId = b.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundtrans ts on ts.shipmentid=c.shipmentid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transdetail chan on chan.id=ts.channel LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transcompany company on company.id=ts.company LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_status d on c.ShipmentStatus=d.`status` left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid where b.SellerSKU=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.status=6 and b.QuantityReceived != b.QuantityShipped and (m.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.shiped_date> date_add(now(), INTERVAL -6 month) ORDER BY a.createdate desc

SELECT ts.arrivalTime,ts.shipmentid,a.createdate, c.shiped_date , ifnull(ifnull(b.QuantityShipped,b.Quantity),0) Quantity,detail.channame channame, ifnull(ifnull(b.QuantityShipped,b.Quantity),0) - ifnull(b.QuantityReceived,0) shipQuantity from t_erp_ship_inboundplan a LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inbounditem b on a.id=b.inboundplanid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundshipment c on a.id=c.inboundplanid and c.ShipmentId = b.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundtrans ts on ts.shipmentid=c.shipmentid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_status d on c.ShipmentStatus=d.`status` left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid left join t_erp_ship_transdetail detail on detail.id = ts.channel where b.SellerSKU=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.status <= 5 and c.status >= 2 and (m.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY ts.arrivalTime asc

SELECT a.marketplaceid, a.createdate, sum(b.Quantity) Quantity from t_erp_ship_inboundplan a left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inbounditem b on a.id=b.inboundplanid where (a.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) group by a.id ORDER BY a.createdate desc limit 0,3;
